alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 2:19AM MST until March 03 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed winter precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Carter, Custer and Fallon. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous tonight. Bridges and overpasses will ice up first. Where the ground is frozen, rain will freeze on contact even at temperatures above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slick roads and difficult travel. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
